name: Successfully register a new user on AutomationExercises

testSteps.description: Given I am on the AutomationExercises homepage

children.description: Given I am on the AutomationExercises homepage
Levi opens the browser at https://automationexercise.com

children.description: When I click on the "Signup / Login" button
And I enter a valid name and email in the Signup section
And I fill in all required fields in the registration form
And I click the "Create Account" button
Then I should see the message "ACCOUNT CREATED!"

userStory.narrative: As a user, I want to create a new account to access the services of the website.

title: Successfully register a new user on AutomationExercises
